Safexpay - VP Engineering

Location - Mumbai

It June 01, 2022

At safexpay we aspire to build a global, digital platform infrastructure and product company focused for every business, with an extraordinary culture that attracts innovative, collaborative people.

Experience

2+ years

Skills

Technical Skills: Java, J2EE, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Hibernate, MySql/Oracle, Angular JS, Jquery, Javascript, HTML

Primary Skills: Core Java, JSP, Spring, Hibernate, MySQL/Oracle, Jquery, Javascript

Secondary Skills: Spring Boot, Mongo DB, Active MQ, AWS, CllCD, Angular JS, HTML

Job Description

  • Candidate should have experience in developing applications using JAVA/J2EE programming skills.
  • Strong in DB knowledge.
  • Should be good with OOPS Concept.
  • Should be good in design and application development using object oriented programming.
  • Should be good in writing secure and optimized code.
  • Experience in any application framework like Spring and ORM tools like Hibernate.
  • Good understanding/experience on software development methodology such as Agile, TDD etc.
  • Good understanding of source control tools and its use (SVN, Git etc...).
  • Experience in web services would be a plus but not mandatory.
  • Experience in multithreaded applications and micro service based development would be a plus.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Pro-active, self-learner, thorough, organized and energetic.
  • Able to work across teams as well as independently.
  • Perform code review of peers.
  • Good in analytical and communication skills.
  • Good experience in the Fintech domain (Payments/ Banking/ Wallets/ Insurance/ Financial Markets).
